trans-unit.source: Displays a collection of child activity designers in a preview strip and, when a child designer is selected on the preview strip, displays the selected activity designer in preview or edit mode on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Mostra uma coleção de estruturadores de atividades subordinadas na barra de pré-visualização e, quando um estruturador subordinado é selecionado na barra de pré-visualização, o designer de atividade selecionada no modo de pré-visualização ou editar numa superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] ActivityPreviewDesigner is a sequential activity designer that displays all of its child activity designers in a strip that appears at the top of its design surface.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]ActivityPreviewDesigner é um designer da actividade sequencial que apresenta todos os respetivos estruturadores de atividades subordinadas numa faixa que aparece na parte superior da respetiva superfície de desenho.

trans-unit.source: When one of the child designers is selected, its representation is displayed in a preview window that the activity preview designer hosts below the strip.
trans-unit.target: Quando um dos estruturadores subordinado é selecionado, respetiva representação é apresentada numa janela de pré-visualização que o estruturador de pré-visualização de atividade aloja abaixo de faixa.

trans-unit.source: The ActivityPreviewDesigner has a preview mode and an edit mode.
trans-unit.target: O ActivityPreviewDesigner tem um modo de pré-visualização e um modo de edição.

trans-unit.source: Preview mode allows the user to view the entire representation of the selected designer without scrolling; however, preview mode does not allow the user to modify the selected activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Modo de pré-visualização permite ao utilizador ver a representação toda do designer selecionado sem deslocamento; No entanto, o modo de pré-visualização não permite o utilizador modifique o designer de atividade selecionada.

trans-unit.source: Edit mode allows the user to modify the selected activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Modo de edição permite que o utilizador modifique o designer de atividade selecionada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that allows the designer to adjust its UI for users with disabilities.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> que permite que o estruturador para ajustar a interface de utilizador para os utilizadores com incapacidades.

trans-unit.source: If the initial value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> creates an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor inicial do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>é uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> that allows the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> to adjust its UI for users who have impairments.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> que permite que o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> para ajustar a interface de utilizador para os utilizadores com deficiências.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of activity designers that are displayed by the activity preview designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de estruturadores de atividades que são apresentados pelo estruturador de pré-visualização de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> read-only collection that contains the designers displayed by <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> só de leitura coleção que contém os designers apresentados pela <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the current drop target in the array of drop targets returned by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o índice do destino de largar atual na matriz de destinos de largar devolvido pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets*>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.GetDropTargets*>

trans-unit.source: The CurrentDropTarget set operation sets the target in the preview strip that appears at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: A operação de conjunto CurrentDropTarget define o destino na barra de pré-visualização que aparece na parte superior do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the index of the current drop target for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Um número inteiro que representa o índice de destino de largar atual do designer.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release the managed resources; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar os recursos geridos; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Ensures that the specified activity designer is visible on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Garante que o designer de atividade especificada está visível a superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner verifies that all activity designers in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, and their children, are displayed in the preview strip at the top of the designer.
trans-unit.target: EnsureVisibleContainedDesigner verifica se todos os estruturadores de atividades no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, e os respetivos subordinados, são apresentados na barra de pré-visualização na parte superior do designer.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> for which to ensure visibility on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para o qual Certifique-se de visibilidade na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the first selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto selecionável primeira na ordem de navegação do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> do not contain null references (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), FirstSelectableObject will return the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A>não contém referências nulas (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), FirstSelectableObject irá devolver o valor da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property contains a null reference (`Nothing`), FirstSelectableObject will return the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the first designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A>propriedade contém uma referência nula (`Nothing`), FirstSelectableObject irá devolver o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>associados com o designer no primeiro o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that is the first selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Object>que é o objeto selecionável primeira na ordem de navegação do estruturador.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that bound the activity designer's connectors.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma matriz de retângulos vinculado conectores o designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: GetConnectors returns an empty array if one or more of the following conditions occur: - The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> is not the active designer on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: GetConnectors devolve uma matriz vazia se um ou mais das seguintes condições ocorrerem: - <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>não é o designer de Active Directory na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> does not contain any child activity designer.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>não contém qualquer designer de atividade subordinada.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> is not expanded on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: -O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>não está expandido na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> is set to `true`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that defines the bounds of all connectors in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> matriz que define os limites de todos os conectores no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of rectangles that represent the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma matriz de retângulos que representam as localizações de largar válido dentro de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If `dropPoint` is in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> preview strip, GetDropTargets returns the possible drop targets in the strip.
trans-unit.target: Se `dropPoint` está a ser o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>barra de pré-visualização, GetDropTargets devolve os destinos de possível largar a faixa.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that defines the x- and y-coordinates for the drop target.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que define as coordenadas x e y para o destino de largar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> array that represents the valid drop locations within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> matriz que representa as localizações de largar válido dentro de <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the first selectable object that follows the specified object in the navigation order of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o objeto selecionável primeiro que se segue o objeto especificado na ordem de navegação de atual <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Since users can only navigate horizontally in the preview pane of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, GetNextSelectableObject only recognizes <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection>.
trans-unit.target: Uma vez que os utilizadores só podem navegar horizontalmente no painel de pré-visualização do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>GetNextSelectableObject apenas reconhece <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The current object in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O objeto atual a ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the direction in which designer navigation occurs.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerNavigationDirection"> </xref> ocorre de valor de enumeração que especifica a direção na qual navegação estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The first selectable that follow obj in the navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro selecionável que se seguem obj na ordem de navegação.

trans-unit.source: Gets a read-only collection of glyphs that are associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção só de leitura de glifos que estão associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Glyphs contains the collection of glyphs to display in the preview strip at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Glyphs contém a coleção de glifos a apresentar na barra de pré-visualização no topo da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"></xref> read-only collection that contains the glyphs associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph"> </xref> só de leitura coleção que contém os glifos associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> contains no other activity designers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto a apresentar quando o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> não contém nenhum outros os estruturadores de atividades.

trans-unit.source: The HelpText set operation adds text to the preview strip at the top of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: A operação de conjunto HelpText adiciona texto para a barra de pré-visualização no topo da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text to display on the designer surface
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o texto a apresentar na superfície do designer

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Devolve informações sobre o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> nas coordenadas especificadas na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the coordinates on the workflow design surface from which to gather information.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que contém as coordenadas na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho do qual pretende recolher informações.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"></xref> that contains information about the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> at the specified coordinates
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.HitTestInfo"> </xref> que contém informações sobre o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> nas coordenadas especificadas

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer used by the specified activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o estruturador utilizado pela atividade especificada.

trans-unit.source: This sets up listening to the selection change event for the activity designer associated with `activity`.
trans-unit.target: Esta ação configura a escutar o evento de alteração de seleção para o designer de atividade associadado `activity`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> for which to initialize the designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> para o qual ao inicializar o estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified activity designer is visible in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um valor que indica se o designer de atividade especificada está visível no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> is `true` and the preview window is set to preview mode, IsContainedDesignerVisible returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>é `true` e a janela de pré-visualização estiver definida como modo de pré-visualização, IsContainedDesignerVisible devolve `false`.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para verificar.

trans-unit.source: if containedDesigner is visible; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if containedDesigner is visible; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: containedDesigner contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: containedDesignercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets the last selectable object in the navigation order of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último objeto selecionável ordem de navegação do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> and <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> do not contain null references (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), LastSelectableObject returns the value of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> property of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>e <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A>não contém referências nulas (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), LastSelectableObject devolve o valor da <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.Activity%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsVisible%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A> contains a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), LastSelectableObject returns the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> associated with the last designer in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>contém uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic), LastSelectableObject devolve o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>associados com o designer de último no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ContainedDesigners%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.PreviewedDesigner%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that is the last selectable object in the designer navigation order.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que é o último objeto selecionável na ordem de navegação do estruturador.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Loads the view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> from a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o estado de visualização do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> partir de um fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to restore the designer view state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>utilizados para restaurar o estado de visualização do estruturador.</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.source: reader contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic)
trans-unit.target: readercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic)

trans-unit.source: The designer host associated with the designer is a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).
trans-unit.target: O anfitrião estruturador associado com o designer é uma referência nula (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref>).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the designer in logical coordinates on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a localização do designer em coordenadas lógicas na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The Location set operation updates the location of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> and all child designers it contains.
trans-unit.target: A operação de localização do conjunto de atualizações a localização do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>e todos os designers de subordinados nele contidos.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that contains the x- and y-coordinates associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> que contém as coordenadas x e y associadas a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer that the number of activities contained in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o estruturador de que o número de atividades incluído no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: `listChangeArgs` contains the activity designers that have been added and removed from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: `listChangeArgs`contém os estruturadores de atividades que tenham sido adicionados e removidos <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: OnContainedActivitiesChanged updates the designer verbs associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> and modifies the designer layout on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: OnContainedActivitiesChanged atualiza os verbos estruturador associados a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>e modifica o esquema do estruturador na superfície de desenho de fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollectionChangeEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: listChangeArgs contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: listChangeArgscontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor enters the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> quando está em curso uma operação de arrastar largar e cursor do rato o utilizador introduz os limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when a drag-drop operation is in progress and the user's mouse cursor is inside the bounds of the designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> quando está em curso uma operação de arrastar largar e cursor do rato do utilizador está dentro dos limites do designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDragEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Performs layout tasks to position visual cues and child designers on the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas de esquema para a posição ajudas visuais e designers subordinado no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: e contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: econtém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Sets the size of the visual cues on the designers contained within the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define o tamanho dos ajudas visuais em estruturadores contidos o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: OnLayoutSize determines the size of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner> preview strip that displays the collection of child activity designers and the preview window that displays the selected activity designer.
trans-unit.target: OnLayoutSize determina o tamanho do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>Pré-visualizar faixa que apresenta a coleção de estruturadores de atividades subordinadas e a janela de pré-visualização que mostra o designer de atividade selecionada.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: OnLayoutSize also determines the size of the preview window depending on whether the designer is in edit or preview mode.
trans-unit.target: OnLayoutSize também determina o tamanho da janela de pré-visualização, dependendo se o estruturador está no modo de edição ou pré-visualização.

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A> returns `false`, OnLayoutSize returns the base implementation inherited from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>devolve `false`, OnLayoutSize devolve a implementação base herdada de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.SequentialActivityDesigner.Expanded%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerLayoutEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that contains the new size settings for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> que contém as novas definições de tamanho para o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when the user double-clicks on the surface of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> quando o utilizador faz duplo clique na superfície do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: When the user double-clicks in the preview window OnMouseDoubleClick enables edit mode on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador faz duplo clique na janela de pré-visualização que onmousedoubleclick permite editar modo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> when the user presses the mouse button down while the pointer is in designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> quando o utilizador premir o botão do rato para baixo enquanto o ponteiro estiver nos limites do estruturador.

trans-unit.source: If the user presses the mouse button down while the cursor is in the preview window, edit mode is turned on for the designer.
trans-unit.target: Se o presses de utilizador, o botão do rato para baixo enquanto o cursor está na janela de pré-visualização, de modo de edição está ativado para o estruturador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the user moves the mouse cursor out of designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o estruturador quando o utilizador move o cursor do rato fora dos limites estruturador.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the designer when the user releases the mouse button in the designer bounds.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o estruturador quando o utilizador liberta o botão do rato no Estruturador dos limites.

trans-unit.source: When the user releases the mouse button over the preview strip, the scrollable button changes to a minimum scroll arrow.
trans-unit.target: Quando o utilizador liberta o botão do rato sobre a barra de pré-visualização, as alterações de botão deslocável para uma seta de deslocamento mínimo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Draws the visual representation of the activity associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a representação visual de atividade associada a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs"> </xref> que contém os dados do evento.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> that its associated theme has changed.
trans-unit.target: Notifica o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> que o tema associado foi alterada.

trans-unit.source: OnThemeChange not only updates the theme property settings for <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, it also renders the new settings to the preview window.
trans-unit.target: OnThemeChange não só atualiza as definições de propriedade de tema para <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, compõe também as novas definições para a janela de pré-visualização.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"></xref> that contains the updated theme property settings.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme"> </xref> que contém as definições de propriedade de tema atualizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer to preview in the preview section of the activity designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estruturador para pré-visualizar na secção pré-visualização do designer de atividade.

trans-unit.source: If no designer is selected in the preview strip section of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, PreviewedDesigner returns a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum estruturador está selecionado na secção pré-visualização da faixa do <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, PreviewedDesigner devolve uma referência nula (`Nothing` no Visual Basic).</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to display in the preview section of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref> para apresentar na secção pré-visualização do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Updates the configuration errors associated with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza os erros de configuração associados a <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: RefreshDesignerActions not only updates the actions associated with <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, it also renders the new views to the preview window.
trans-unit.target: RefreshDesignerActions não só atualiza as ações associadas <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>, compõe também as novas vistas para a janela de pré-visualização.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Updates the view displayed in the preview window of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Atualiza a vista apresentada na janela de pré-visualização do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> must be set to `true` for RefreshPreview to perform view updates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>tem de ser definido como `true` para RefreshPreview efetuar atualizações de vista.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: Stores the current view state of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref> to a binary stream.
trans-unit.target: Armazena o estado de vista atual do <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref> para uma transmissão em fluxo binário.

trans-unit.source: SaveViewState saves the currently selected activity designer in the preview strip and, if <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A> returns `true`, the contents of the preview window.
trans-unit.target: SaveViewState guarda o designer de atividade atualmente selecionado na barra de pré-visualização e, se <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>devolve `true`, o conteúdo da janela de pré-visualização.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner.ShowPreview%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> to which the current designer view state is stored.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>para que o atual estado de visualização estruturador é armazenado.</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: writer contains null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: writercontém uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the activity preview should be displayed in the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se a pré-visualização de atividade deve ser apresentada no designer.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display the activity preview in the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para apresentar a pré-visualização de atividade no <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of verbs to associate with the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção dos verbos para associar o <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection"></xref> that contains the verbs associated with <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerVerbCollection"> </xref> que contém os verbos associados <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityPreviewDesigner"> </xref>.
